passives.name: Energized
passives.effects: Moving and basic attacking generates Energize stacks, up to 100.

passives.name: Helix
passives.effects: Dealing damage with an ability generates 30 Energize stacks and triggers the effects of Energized attacks if they are ready (2.5s-second cooldown per cast instance).

passives.name: Spiral Out
passives.effects: When fully Energized, your next basic attack generates a Rune stack and fires a missile at the target for each Rune stack you have, dealing + magic damage (+ 11% bonus AD) (+ 8% AP) (+ 0.3s per 100 bonus health) magic damage with each missile. Stacks are reset every round and between each phase in a round.
